Game.Title: Reverb.v1
Game.Description:
Reverb is the first iteration of a game that was produced for the SA Game Developer Community.
Made using the proprietary Dubstep engine (Gamemaker).The team that produced it has been making games for under a month so keep this in mind!
We hope you enjoy it and check back soon for the final version!

Team.Member: Art, Animation and Design: Luc Wolthers
Score, Design and Creative Directive: Reg Krommenhoek

Game.CopyrightAndAttribution: All rights of this work belong to Biotology Games. We will sue you.
